description: The Le Massif Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Le Massif for the snow report
Alexa, ask Le Massif for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Le Massif
shortDescription: The Le Massif Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Le Massif.
